items.title: Why Frontier Is Betting $31M On Ocean Alkalinity For Carbon Removal
items.description: A $31M deal to use ocean chemistry for carbon removal signals a turning point for ocean-based climate solutions and markets.

items.title: AI Helps Researchers Peek Into The Heart Of An Active Volcano
items.description: Using AI to process high-volume data, researchers have successfully recreated a 3D-model of the interior of an active volcano.

items.title: InnovationRx: Microsoft Cofounder Paul Allen’s Estate Launches $500 Million Fund For Research
items.description: In this week’s edition of InnovationRx, we look at whether Congress will extend Obamacare subsidies, the latest data on Lilly’s obesity pill and more.

items.title: ‘Alien: Earth’ Episode 4 Recap And Review — Dreadfully Dull And Goofy
items.description: Alien: Earth is a slog brought down by its extended Peter Pan metaphor and lifeless characters.

items.title: The Slippery Slope Of Government Ownership In Public Companies
items.description: Intel's $8.9B U.S. government stake sparks debate: Is America risking tech innovation and global trust by inviting politics into the heart of Silicon ...
